classification: John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act
security: Revealing the operational details of contacting Cuban exiles and suggesting defection could compromise sources and methods. Quoting, "While in New York 7 OCTOPER contacting Cuban exiles with possible links MEXI, LITAMIL-3 had chance ENCOUNTED and CHATTED OPIFFLY with ANTONIO DE SOUZA CARBAJAL...L-3 SUGGESTED DEFECTION to which DE SOUZA PEPLIED HE MERELY PERFOPPING HIS DUTY and VERY FRIGHTENED."
summary: A cable from Mexico City reports that LITAMIL-3, while in New York, contacted Antonio de Souza Carbajal, a member of CIRAN, and suggested he defect, to which de Souza responded he was frightened but would talk again under secure circumstances.
summary_one_paragraph: A SECRET cable originating from Mexico City on October 15, 1963, reports an encounter in New York between agent LITAMIL-3 and Antonio de Souza Carbajal, a member of CIRAN. LITAMIL-3 contacted Cuban exiles with possible links to MEXI and LITAMIL-3 in New York and suggested de Souza defect. De Souza stated he was frightened but open to future discussions under secure conditions, leading to a request for traces, comments, and advice on a potential follow-up trip by LITAMIL-3 to further engage de Souza.
title: PORIUMEN HIBASTE
